name: Data Engineer (Information Retrieval Team)
description:
About team:
On the Product Design team, we think differently, combining the knowledge and resources of an established company with the unapologetic boldness of a startup. We are building a software solution that connects data in revolutionary ways, illuminating answers that were previously impossible to find and empowering our clients to envision the future, so they can determine the best course of action in the present. We are disrupting the current digital transformation landscape with state-of-the-art AI developed by a passionate team with a bias to action.

The focus of our teams are data converting, ingestion and processing, search and data similarity algorithms, score and data fusion.

The main technical challenges of our Team is to architect and implement a platform that is capable to provide:

  • Massive and scalable data ingestion from various data sources simultaneously, performing decomposition of unstructured, semi-structured and structured content, that is being ingested, into semantically consistent entities
  • Resilient, secure and scalable storage to keep the data safe, secured and connected
  • Modern high-performing high-quality information retrieval solutions based on AI/ML
  • Capturing and utilizing user feedback to improve quality of the Information Retrieval functions
  • Exemplary development efficiency and level of automation in building domain-specific and even problem-specific solutions based on the same platform
  • Exemplary level of operations efficiency and self-maintenance for running solution
  • Running the solutions on any platform – Cloud or on-premises

About the role:

  • Design, implement, and support a platform providing access to large datasets
  • Data modeling for Information Retrieval algorithms
  • Prototyping the Information Retrieval algorithms
  • Data and algorithms profiling
  • Analytical tools that provide insights about data and information retrieval quality
  • Serve as mentor and coach to Data Science teams
  • Ensure high level of automation of work processes related to data delivery
  • Serve as technical product owner for the Information Retrieval project’s sub-domain
  • Participate in production development of the Information Retrieval algorithms including probabilistic and deep semantic models​

About you:

  • 3 years of growing experience in the Data Engineer role
  • Deep knowledge in scripting languages (Python)
  • Experience in working with large complex data sets
  • Experience in CI/CD/MLOps pipelines
  • Experience in building infrastructures for data acquisition and analysis with high level of automation
  • Experience in development software for high volume data ingestion using Apache Spark, Storm, Zookeeper, Kafka or equivalent
  • Experience in Information Retrieval solutions based on probabilistic and AI/ML techniques
  • Experience in building algorithms based on user behavior (click data)

​What we offer

  • Work with AI/ML technologies
  • Becoming proficient in Information Retrieval systems
  • A greenfield project – opportunity to learn and use the best technologies and products
  • Gain additional experience in building a scalable distributed platform-agnostic product
  • Team of great professionals
  • Competitive salary with annual indexation according to region inflation
  • Bonus awards with IHSMarkit stocks
  • Medical insurance for employees and their families
  • Sport support (swimming pool, gym)
  • English classes

14 000 people
30 countries
About Company

IHS Markit (NASDAQ: INFO) is a global information company. We bring together the deepest intelligence across the widest set of capital-intensive industries and markets. By connecting data across variables, our analysts and industry specialists present our customers with a richer, highly integrated view of their world. Our customers are 85% of Fortune Global 500 and 94 of the 100 largest U.S. corporations. Headquarters is in London, UK. We employ more than 14,000 people in more than 30 countries around the world.

IHS Markit МІNSK has been developing for 15 years its own products such as Goldfire, IHS Connect, and Engineering Workbench. IHS Markit МІNSK is a resident of High Tech Park.

Benefits

Competitive salary

Salary protection from exchange fluctuation

Annual salary indexation according to region inflation

Medical insurance for employees and their families

Employee Assistance Program

Bonus awards with IHS Markit stocks

Training, Coaching and Participation in International

Conferences paid by IHS Markit

Patent generation by IHS Markit

Compensation of expenses for professional literature

Sport support (swimming pool, gym)

English classes

Office

Ergonomic and functional Health&Wellness office Modern business center Riviera Plaza in the fast developing Minsk district

Air conditioning upon EU standards, highgrade elevation and ventilation equipment

Various recreation systems

Park zone with bike lanes

IHS Markit
Corporate Sustainability

Sustainability is a core element of our business model and key to our future performance. Our goal is to care about the environment, our heritage, education and people around us.

We contribute to the development of local NGO organizations and associations.

Corporate Sustainability is not a project it is the foundation of our work and corporate culture.

Take up the great challenge and join our talent team!
